underlying_goal: Fix multiple bugs in a CMS automation system: STEP 2 summary black circle (●) issue, STEP 8 ppv_menu.html reflection button functionality, and STEP 1 last subtitle komi_type constraint
friction_detail: User reported twice that previous fixes were not actually working (STEP 2 summary ● issue and STEP 8 reflection button), requiring re-investigation and correction.
brief_summary: User needed fixes for CMS automation bugs (summary black circles, reflection button, subtitle type constraint); STEP 8 was debugged and fixed via Chrome DevTools, STEP 2 required re-investigation, and STEP 1 constraint was being planned at session end.
